pr_title: Lots of refactoring and rewriting of Item Energy

timeline.message: Lots of refactoring and rewriting of Item Energy
Added Unit tests for rechargeable items
Fixed a slight mistake with the lore
Fixed a few more color codes for 1.16 (Sorry Walshy :P )
Fixed a rare concurrency issue with world saving
